name: Warframe Wukong Prime Access: Cloud Walker Pack
detailed_description:
Get Wukong Prime Access now and instantly add the latest Prime Warframe and Prime Weapons to your Arsenal!

For more Prime Access Bundle options, click here.

CLOUD WALKER PACK
2625 Platinum
Wukong Prime
Zhuge Prime
Ninkondi Prime
Wukong Prime Glyphs

Wukong Prime, Zhuge Prime and Ninkondi Prime can also be crafted from parts found in Relics in-game.

Note: This pack can only be purchased as part of a bundle.

short_description: Make the newest Prime Warframe and Weapons yours instantly. Cloud Walker Pack includes 2625 Platinum, Wukong Prime, Zhuge Prime, Ninkondi Prime and Exclusive Wukong Prime Glyphs.
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7 64-Bit (32-bit not supported)
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo e6400 or AMD Athlon x64 4000+
  • Video:DirectX 10+ capable Graphics Card
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Storage:35 GB available HD space
  • Internet:Broadband Internet Connection Required

Note: There is no Mac or Linux client currently available.

legal_notice: Warframe and the Warframe logo are registered trademarks of Digital Extremes Ltd.

content_descriptors.notes: Warframe is an action game focusing on combat that includes violence, blood and gore.
